Description: Blue glazed composition amulet in the form of a figure of Thoth, striding and ibis-headed, wearing short kilt, with arms by sides, dorsal pillar, pierced behind chest for suspension, rectangular base.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.24
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2002, St Albans, Life and Death
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
